#ESCA-NFT  
The fictional space station AWAY.  
The next stage of the fictional space station AWAY is the solar system ESCA.  
Approximately 78,500 light years away from Earth.  
The Esca solar system consists of four planets: Olympia, Andor, Tsukuriyo, Silva, 
The solar system ESCA is composed of four.

Esca is a planet that is  
The best of all worlds. Ascending. Superior. It has the meaning of
